# selectionChanged(at:)

**Instance Method**

Triggers selection feedback at the specified location.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func selectionChanged(at location: CGPoint)
```

## Reporting selection changes

- **selectionChanged()**: Triggers selection feedback.
